game.title: The Lost Relics
game.objective: Find and return the lost relics of Valoria
game.description: Locate the ancient relics that once belonged to the lost civilization of Valoria: The Scepter of Wisdom, the Crown of Valor, and the Amulets of Truth and Justice. Bring them back to the Temple of Valoria to reconstruct the story of Valoria's fall.
game.reward: Valorian Legacy Armor, 3000 gold, and 5000 experience points

task.description: The Scepter of Wisdom can be found in the Crypt of Sorrows, the entrance to which lies within the depths of the Dark Forest. Beware of the undead guardians!
The Crown of Valor lies in the Fiery Pits, guarded by fire-breathing creatures and lava rivers. It is said to shine brightest in the face of danger.

task.objective: Find the Amulets of Truth and Justice
task.description: The amulets are believed to be situated at the top of the Crystal Peaks. They are protected by a riddle only the most resourceful can solve.
